action_item: Workflow - Identify a designated person to walk through current workflows in NextGen.
notes: This is to assess differences between NextGen and Dr. Cloud.

action_item: Workflow - Conduct a detailed walkthrough of how workflows are set up within NextGen.
notes: Focus on user roles, permissions, and forms used in workflows.

action_item: Requirements - Review reporting requirements for patient population and state reporting.
notes: Understand requirements for operations and compliance.

action_item: Requirements - Share EPSDT guidelines for documentation requirements.
notes: Ensure compliance with state guidelines for school-based health.

action_item: Interface - Request integration of eligibility checking through EHR system.
notes: Link eligibility checking for insurance to streamline processes.

action_item: Requirements - Compile a list of required fields for documentation to meet state audit requirements.
notes: Discuss with providers to finalize required fields.

action_item: Reports - Share the NextGen training manual with the team.
notes: This manual contains step-by-step instructions for users.
